audioJson.name: Microgroove discs
audioJson.capacity:
7": 3 minutes (per side)
10": 15 minutes (per side)
12": 25 minutes (per side)
audioJson.fact1: This format is an updated verson of the gramophone disc and was adopted as the new standard by the entire record industry
audioJson.fact2: The most well-known version of this format today is a 12” disc played at 33 ⅓ rpm (revolutions per minute)
audioJson.fact3: An earlier version of this format was created by RCA Victor in 1931, intended to use as transcription discs
